mapper.select: SELECT T.*, M.MEMBERID, M.MEMBERNICKNAME FROM TRAVEL T LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON T.MEMBERNUM = M.MEMBERNUM ORDER BY BOARDNUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRAVEL VALUES (BOARDNUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberNum}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE, NULL, 0, #{fileName}, BOARDNUM_SEQ.CURRVAL, NULL, NULL, #{pingNum})
